title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Federal Fast Lane: Deploying Mission Technology at Commercial Speed(API101)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 联邦快车道：以商业速度部署任务技术(API101)
abstract: Commercial innovation thrives on agility – cloud-native platforms, rapid iteration, and user-first design. Federal missions, however, demand assurance: security, compliance, and deployment in complex environments. In this Lightning Talk, Jared Summers shares how agencies can leverage AWS and commercial-grade platforms to balance both speed and trust. They’ll outline strategies for scaling securely, navigating compliance hurdles, and accelerating adoption of AI and emerging technologies without compromising mission integrity. With real-world lessons from federal deployment, you’ll learn how to deliver innovation at commercial speed, mission-ready from day one. This presentation is brought to you by LMI, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 商业创新依赖于敏捷性——云原生平台、快速迭代和以用户为先的设计。然而，联邦任务需要保障：安全性、合规性以及在复杂环境中的部署。在本次闪电演讲中，Jared Summers 分享了政府机构如何利用 AWS 和商业级平台来平衡速度与信任。他们将概述安全扩展、应对合规障碍以及加速采用 AI 和新兴技术的策略，同时不损害任务完整性。通过联邦部署的实际经验，您将学习如何以商业速度交付创新，从第一天起就做好任务准备。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴 LMI 提供。
